name: LearnUpon
overview:
LearnUpon is a new cloud based, affordable learning management system designed specifically to meet the needs of training companies, content developers and small to medium sized companies.

It can be setup in minutes, is intuitive to use, is SCORM compliant and tablet ready. With LearnUpon training companies can create branded client portals in minutes and license out their online courses to each client. Our dashboard makes it easy for you to manage your business and identify new sales opportunities ahead of time.

LearnUpon allows training companies and content developers who need to deliver online courses to their customers to create new branded client portals in minutes. You can license out your courses to your clients using a range of licensing models (e.g. number of enrollments, date range).

Create new online courses directly in LearnUpon using our in-built course editor or alternatively import your existing courses. LearnUpon provides full SCORM support, just upload your zip file and you are ready to go. You can also import videos, Word, PowerPoint and PDF documents.

Create tests and surveys and award branded certificates to your learners on course completion. You can also award any of the following educational credits if you need to:

  • CPD
  • CEU
  • CLE
  • CME
  • CE

Report across any of your client portals or courses to track progress and completions.

LearnUpon also has full eCommerce functionality which can be turned on or off as required. Create your own public course catalog with company overview, twitter feed and course listings. Customers can purchase and checkout using PayPal.

All in a modern Web 2.0 app with full HTML5 tablet support.
